Key Match Events: Kylian Mbappé scored a penalty on his return after breaking his nose
Robert Lewandowski equalized from a penalty 11 minutes from time
Pre-Game Insights: Antoine Griezmann was unusually left out of the starting XI
Didier Deschamps went with the front three that played together for Paris Saint-Germain over the past season
Post-Match Reflections: France will now head to Duesseldorf for a last-16 tie next Monday against the runners-up in Group E
France are now on the same side of the draw as Portugal, Spain and Germany, which they would have avoided by topping the group
France will certainly need to improve on this performance, and their previous group outings, if they are to win the competition
Miscellaneous Highlights: Théo Hernandez was the first France player to test Lukasz Skorupski
Poland had already been eliminated before this game, becoming the first team to go out after losing their opening two matches
Others: Lewandowski, Poland's all-time top scorer, was returning to the stadium where he made his name with Borussia Dortmund a decade ago
